name: MindSweep (Team SunForge)
description:
Take control of the robots Sero & Tonin, and delve into the depths of your patients' minds...

Welcome to MindSweep!

Take the roles of two microscopic robots that have been injected into the brains of those who suffer from depression. Punch your way through bad thoughts and restore your patient's mental health. This will grant you several boons! 

Mental health is energy for you, a tool that makes you stronger and faster. The more of it you restore, the more efficient you become. But the patient's mind will also wake from their depressed slumber, and as it increases in activity, the stage will also speed up!

Watch out not to fall off of the screen, or get squished by the ceiling!

Controls:

Player 1 moves with WASD and punches with Space.

Player 2 moves with the arrow keys and punches with Right Shift.

To respawn, press the punch button.

Credits:

Programmer - GyD Geza

Artist - Punmpkin
